page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar initializeitems method
page.description: Initialize items in the control bar. This is automatically called when the control bar is created. If item definitions are changed after creation, A5.ControlBar.initializeItems must be called in order for the changes to take effect.
page.example: // assume cbObj is a pointer to an instance of A5.ControlBar cbObj.items['action1'].settings.html = 'Choose Action'; // change a value in an item in the control bar cbObj.initializeItems(); // re-initialize items cbObj.refresh(); // refresh the control bar
